entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
